attributes.action: SCRAP THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SCRAP THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS STRAIGHT AWAY PRIME MINISTER OR ELSE FACE THE ROTH OF ME AND THE BUS COMPANIES OF BRITAIN WHICH ARE HAVING TO CUT BACK ON LOADS AND LOADS OF VITAL BUS ROUTES SUCH IS WHAT WILTS AND DORSET BUS COMPANY, METROBUS, COUNTRYLINER COACHES, AND OTHER BUS COMPANIES, DO NOT PRIME MINISTER THINK THAT I AM JOKING UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES AT ALL WHATSOEVER THINK I AM BECAUSE I AM NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES AT ALL WHATSOEVER AM I. WE THE UNDERSIGNED BUS COMPANIES AND I MR LEE LUCKHAM ARE NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMTANCES AT ALL WHATSOEVER ARE NOT HAPPY WITH YOU THE PRIME MINISTER. BE CAREFUL PRIME MINISTER.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
